https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9Jmxl4uy2LTZExjyn8dj6SoMvsc.jpg Young Army staff sergeant Wesley Kent returns to his small hometown from war in Afghanistan. He must cope with burying the body of his best friend under his command and enduring the news of the death of his girlfriend Aspen Malverne who passed away in a car accident while he was abroad. Approaching Midnight
